Name: Abasralsa
About the game: Find out the story of a simple crazy Vlad who lies on his bed imagines a crazy journey. He was given life imprisonment in a psychiatric hospital and you play in his head. In fact, all this does not exist. Find out what's in the mind of the psycho and what they see. You will have to get out of this strange fantasy. Sense in fact, no, you need to watch what is happening and just get out of the head of the main character. Features: -Pressure atmosphere -Other weapons -Various monsters -Good graphics
